guide.introduction: A video about Jartron.
guide.introduction_rendered:
A video about Jartron.

Relevant parts
  • arduweenie
  • Junk CD/DVD
Tools
  • Dremel tool with cuttigng, grinding, or routing bits
  • Hot Glue gun & hot glue
  • Soldering iron
  • Wire cutter/stripper
  • hand-held electric drill

parts.notes: CDs work better than DVDs for this because DVD layers tend to separate when we cut them up

lines.text: * Four legs! * curly toes! * six CDs! * kindly face! * LASER nose! * multi-chromatic mouth! * stereoscopic ranging vision! * bias for action! * protective headgear!
lines.text_raw: * Four legs! * curly toes! * six CDs! * kindly face! * LASER nose! * multi-chromatic mouth! * stereoscopic ranging vision! * bias for action! * protective headgear!

lines.text: Jartron the robot seeks distant places, but will take momentary interest in very close things.  He is known to spontaneously perform LASER light shows and draw on the wall.
lines.text_raw: Jartron the robot seeks distant places, but will take momentary interest in very close things.  He is known to spontaneously perform LASER light shows and draw on the wall.

guide.summary: Jartron was the winner of the 2010 Makezine CoasterBot contest.  This is how I made him, more or less.
guide.title: Jartron
